Instruction: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Mix in flour and Seasoning Mix. Cook and stir for about 1 minute. Gradually whisk in milk and beer until smooth, cooking and stirring constantly until the sauce starts to thicken, about 5 minutes. Add cheeses gradually, stirring until melted and the sauce becomes smooth.

Heat butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Sprinkle with flour and Seasoning Mix, cook and stir for 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk and beer until smooth. Cook, stirring constantly, for approximately 5 minutes until the sauce begins to thicken. Gradually whisk in cheeses until melted and smooth. If desired, transfer the cheese mixture to a warm fondue pot or slow cooker to keep it warm.
